hero.title: the new standard for collaboration
hero.subtitle: We help you understand and manage your team effectively, providing actionable insights. We help your team by keeping things simple.

subscribe.title: Check out our Telegram!
subscribe.description: Subscribe and stay tuned for BIG announcements and exclusive offers.

features.title: The help that managers need! Groop's analytics grows and evolves alongside your business, helping to identify problem areas and

card1.title: Manager's Assistant
card1.description: Groop will monitor the completion of project tasks, assess team performance, and evaluate the productivity of each employee.

card2.title: Fosters good environment
card2.description: Groop's AI examines work chats in Telegram and provides effective recommendations to improve the communication environment and enhance each employee's productivity.

card3.title: Successful projects
card3.description: Using Groop, managers can reduce costs and project timelines through timely and precise decisions based on valuable insights.

analytics.title: Groop's AI analytics will help successfully deliver complex projects
analytics.description: Ever evolving analytics, which improves alongside your business.

card1.title: Select your work chat
card1.description: Groop turns your work chat into the source of retrospective data. Select desired chat to gain insights.

card2.title: Choose a topic
card2.description: Select a topic from Groop's library with more to come.

card3.title: Set timeframe
card3.description: Set specific dates or select preset period from the list.

card4.title: Get result
card4.description: Instantly dive into your team's activity with smart reports generated through AI analysis.

tasks.title: Smart task tracker at your fingertips
tasks.description: Improve productivity of your team by simplifying their workflow. Groop ensures that every team member is notified about their tasks, and the manager is informed about the progress.

card1.title: Find Groop in Telegram Apps Center
card1.description: Open the app in just a few clicks directly through the Telegram Apps Center.

card2.title: Set tasks and goals
card2.description: Create tasks, add descriptions, and assign them to team members.

card3.title: Track progress
card3.description: Track progress with convenient and visually clear app structure.

card4.title: Seamless Integration
card4.description: Transfer data from other applications, ensuring a smooth transition and minimal disruption.

team.title: Build a productive team
team.description: Increase the efficiency of your business by building a productive team. Groop will show you a simple way to do it.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Experience the real productivity growth of your business with Groop:

footer.description: Key to productivity of your team through intelligent automation.
